name: Retro Blackjack
description:
This is a retro styled Black jack game made using Python and Pygame. The game is planned to be part of a tutorial series on my youtube channel. The source code will be freely available through the tutorial and Github shortly.

Assets used:

"Pixel Playing Cards Pack" by George Blackwell

https://georgeblackwell.itch.io/playing-cards-sprite-pack

Sound Effects were made using BFXR
